projects.title: TypeCliGenius
projects.description: TypeCliGenius is a lightweight command-line interface (CLI) tool developed in TypeScript This tool provides a straightforward way to perform various calculations and operations directly from the command line.

projects.title: X-O game
projects.description: A sleek and modern implementation of the classic Tic-Tac-Toe (XO) game built with ReactJS. This project showcases the use of React's stateful components to create a responsive and interactive gaming experience.

projects.title: React-Calculator
projects.description: A simple react js Calculator application, where you can do different operations such as multiplication, subtraction, additional and division. this calculator easy and helpful.

projects.title: Darkmode-toggle-react
projects.description: A customizable and easy-to-integrate React component for implementing a dark mode toggle switch using Tailwind CSS.
